name: Dinner Tonight: Baked Chicken With Yogurt and Chile Paste
description: Donna Hay’s Off the Shelf looked like exactly what I needed. It is all about using ingredients found in the pantry, which is pretty novel. It’s a beautiful book, too, with enormous color-filled pages. But when I thought about it...

recipeInstructions.text: Cut 1/2 inch thick slights in the chicken pieces.
Mix the cornflour, yoghurt, chili paste, mint, cumin, pepper and salt in a very large bowl.
Toss the chicken pieces in the bowl until completely covered with the sauce.
Place on a roasting rack in a pan. Bake for 30 minutes or until done.
